project.description: This project used to publish playground-website-frontend-test ;【2021-11-30 created】

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" PROJECT_NAME="playground-website-frontend-test"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
cd $WORKSPACE # if [ ! -e ./git_rev.txt ];then # touch ./git_rev # fi # if [ -z `cat ./git_rev.txt` ];then # echo $IMAGE_VERSION > ./git_rev.txt # elif [ "`cat ./git_rev.txt`" = "$IMAGE_VERSION" ];then # echo "gitee-repo files not change anything ,shell exit" # exit # else # echo $IMAGE_VERSION > ./git_rev.txt # fi # sed -i "s|pnpm install|npm ci --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile # sed -i '8i RUN rm -rf ./package-lock.json ' ./Dockerfile # docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground/playground-app-test:$IMAGE_VERSION .
sed -i '7i RUN npm cache clean --force' ./Dockerfile sed -i "s|RUN pnpm install|RUN npm i --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|" ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground/playground-app-test:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground/playground-app-test:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground/playground-app-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -e ./image_version.txt ]; then rm -f ./image_version.txt fi
echo "INPUT=$IMAGE_VERSION" > ./image_version.txt
